title: BUSINESS_HOURS_NEXT_START_DATE
description: Returns the next start time of Business Hours after the specified datetime. If no schedule is provided, the default Business Hours are used. The result is returned in UTC.

parameters.name: target_date
parameters.description: The Datetime from which to find the next start of Business Hours.

parameters.name: business_hours_name_optional
parameters.description: The name of the Business Hours. If omitted, the default schedule is applied.

examples:
BUSINESS_HOURS_NEXT_START_DATE(TO_DATETIME("2013-05-28T01:06:08"))
-- Returns the next Business Hours start datetime after "2013-05-28T01:06:08",
-- using the organization's default Business Hours.

BUSINESS_HOURS_NEXT_START_DATE(TO_DATETIME("2013-05-28T01:06:08"), "CustomSchedule")
-- Returns the next start datetime of Business Hours after "2013-05-28T01:06:08",
-- based on the "CustomSchedule" Business Hours.
